name: Anarchy
description: Allow the creation of Huskarls in barracks

name: Andean Sling
description: Skirmisher and Slinger minimum range removed;Slingers +1 attack

name: Architecture
description: Buildings +10% HP, +1/+1 armor, and +3 building armor

name: Arquebus
description: Gunpowder units fire more accurately at moving targets. Increases projectile speed of Bombard Cannons and Bombard Towers by +0.2

name: Atheism
description: +100 years Wonder/Relic victory time and -50% Spies/Treason cost

name: Ballistas
description: Scorpions fire 33% faster & grants +2 attack to the Galley-line

name: Ballistics
description: Archers, Cavalry Archers, Galleys, Castles, and Towers fire more accurately at moving targets

name: Bearded Axe
description: Throwing Axemen +1 Range & +1 Line of Sight

name: Bodkin Arrow
description: Archers, Cavalry Archers, Galleys, Castles, and Towers +1 range and attack. Town Centers +1 attack and Line of Sight.

name: Bracer
description: Archers, Cavalry Archers, Galleys, Castles, and Towers +1 range and attack. Town Centers +1 attack and Line of Sight.

name: Burgundian Vineyards
description: Farmers generate 0.017 gold per second while gathering food

name: Caravan
description: Trade Carts and Trade Cogs move 50% faster

name: Careening
description: Ship pierce armor +1, Transport Ship capacity +5

name: Chemistry
description: Missile units (including siege) +1 attack. Prerequisite for non-unique gunpowder units

name: Chieftains
description: Infantry +5 attack vs cavalry, +4 vs camels. Provides infantry with gold generation while attacking villagers, trade units, and monks (5 gold per villager, 20 gold per Monk/Trade unit)

name: Comitatenses
description: Militia-line, Knight-line, and Centurions train 50% faster and receive a 5 damage charge attack

name: Conscription
description: Working rate of Barracks, Archery Ranges, Stables, and Castles +33%

name: Couriers
description: Kamayuks, Slingers, and Eagle Scouts +1/+2 armor

name: Crenellations
description: Castles have +3 range and garrisoned infantry fire arrows

name: Cuman Mercenaries
description: Allies can train up to 10 free Elite Kipchaks at the Castle

name: Detinets
description: Replaces 40% of Castles' and towers' stone cost with wood

name: Double Crossbow
description: Ballista Elephants and Scorpions fire two projectiles

name: Druzhina
description: Infantry deal 5 damage to adjacent units in a 0.5 tile radius.

name: El Dorado
description: Increases the hit points of Eagle Warriors by +40

name: Elite Chu Ko Nu
description: Upgrade to Elite Chu Ko Nu

name: Eupseong
description: Watch Towers, Guard Towers and Keeps +2 range

name: Fabric Shields
description: Kamayuks, Slingers, and Eagle Scouts +1/+2 armor

name: Faith
description: Units are harder for enemy Monks to convert

name: First Crusade
description: Each Town Center (max. 5) spawns 5 Serjeants; units become more resistant to conversion

name: Flemish Revolution
description: Turns all villagers into Flemish Militia. Cost of tech = 200 food +10 food per villager converted and 150 gold +5 gold per villager converted

name: Fletching
description: Archers, Cavalry Archers, Galleys, Castles, and Towers +1 range and attack. Town Centers +1 attack and Line of Sight.

name: Forced Levy
description: Turns Militia line units' gold cost to food cost

name: Fortified Wall
description: Fortified Wall 3000 HP 12/12 armor 24 building armor and Gate 4000 HP 6/6 armor 20 building armor

name: Frontier Guards
description: Camel Riders and Elephant Archers get +4 melee armor

name: Furor Celtica
description: Siege Workshop units gain 50% extra HP

name: Grand Trunk Road
description: All gold gathering is 10% faster & reduces the trading fee to 10%

name: Greek Fire
description: Fire Ships +1 range, Dromons’ and Bombard Towers’ blast radius increased by 0.5..

name: Heated Shot
description: Towers +125% and Castles +25% attack against ships

name: Heavy Plow
description: Food amount +75 and Farmers carry +1 food

name: Heresy
description: Units converted by enemy Monks die instead of joining them

name: Houfnice
description: Grants access to an improved, unique version of a Bombard Cannon

name: Hussite Reforms
description: Turns the gold cost of Monks and Monastery technologies into food

name: Inquisition
description: Monks convert faster & gives Missionaries +1 range

name: Kamandaran
description: Archer line units cost 60 wood instead of 25 wood & 45 gold

name: Kataparuto
description: Trebuchets pack/unpack faster and fire 33% faster

name: Lechitic Legacy
description: Gives 33% trample damage (blast damage) to the Scout Cavalry line within 0.5 tile blast radius

name: Logistica
description: Cataphract +0.5 blast radius - trample damage (5 damage) and +6 attack against infantry

name: Mahayana
description: Villagers and Monks take -10% population space

name: Manipur Cavalry
description: Cavalry deals +4 bonus attack vs. archers

name: Marauders
description: Tarkans can be trained at the Stable

name: Masonry
description: Buildings +10% HP, +1/+1 armor, and +3 building armor

name: Medical Corps
description: Elephant units regenerate 30 HP per minute

name: Murder Holes
description: Eliminates minimum range of all buildings

name: Nomads
description: Houses do not lose population when destroyed

name: Obsidian Arrows
description: Archer line has +6 attack vs standard buildings and stone defenses

name: Paiks
description: Rathas and elephant units attack 20% faster

name: Paper Money
description: Lumberjacks generate 0.014 gold (0.023 gold when fully upgraded) per second while gathering wood

name: Parthian Tactics
description: Cavalry Archers +1/+2 armor and increased attack vs Pikemen

name: Redemption
description: Monks can convert most buildings and siege units

name: Rocketry
description: Chu Ko Nu +2 pierce damage and Scorpion +4 pierce

name: Royal Heirs
description: Shotels and Camel units receive -3 damage from Mounted Units

name: Sappers
description: Villagers +15 attack vs buildings and +3 attack vs Rams

name: Shipwright
description: Ships wood cost -20% and creation speed +54%

name: Siege Engineers
description: Siege weapons +1 range (except Rams) and +20% attack vs buildings (Petards +40%)

name: Silk Armor
description: Scout Cavalry line and Cavalry Archers +1 pierce armor

name: Steppe Husbandry
description: Scout Cavalry line and Cavalry Archers are created 80% faster

name: Stirrups
description: Scout Cavalry line and Konniks attack 25% faster

name: Stronghold
description: Castles and towers fire 33% faster & heals allied infantry near castles by 30 HP per minute

name: Supremacy
description: Villagers +6 attack, +40 hit points and +2/+2 armor

name: Szlachta Privileges
description: Reduces the gold cost of Knight-line units by 60%

name: Theocracy
description: Only one Monk in a group must rest after a conversion

name: Thumb Ring
description: Archers and Cavalry Archers fire faster and with 100% accuracy. Slingers +17% attack speed.

name: Tigui
description: Town Centers fire arrows even when not garrisoned. They also fire 8 additional arrows

name: Torsion Engines
description: Siege Workshop units blast radius increased

name: Tower Shields

name: Treason
description: See enemy Kings for a short time (Regicide only)

name: Warwolf
description: Trebuchets do blast damage, 100% accuracy against units

name: Wootz Steel
description: Infantry and cavalry attacks ignore armor

name: Yeomen
description: Foot archers and skirmishers +1 range +1 line of sight and Towers +2 attack
